ModMetaData.name: Pawn Animator
ModMetaData.author: Mlie, Killface
ModMetaData.description: The spiritual successor to Facial Stuff. Adds hands and feet to pawns (currently only humans, haven't worked on Alien Races yet) including basic animations for work and walk cycles depending on the walk speed. Also displays hands on weapons and carried things and can change the way weapons/carried stuff is displayed, meaning things will render behind if the pawn is facing north or west. Features Built upon Mlies SMYH mod, this version includes: · FS animation for hands and feet for walking and working (WIP) · New hand shape for making use of angles · Fully colored hands n feet depending on the apparel coverage · Weapons mostly following hands and will be drwan behind a pawn if facing east or north · Smoother walk cycle animations by blending various speeds together · Walk cycle selection depending on the actual speed and not the job urgency · Preparations for a new animation system (WIP) · Was working with Children School and Pregnancy the last time I tested (please avoid toddlers, they are basic quadrupeds not bipeds ;c) ) · There is also support for Enable Oversized Weapons, Yayo's Combat 3, Yayo's Combat 3 Adopted, Yayo's Animation, RunAndGun and Dual Wield. Hands and feet will follow the weapons even during the extra animations. Verified to work with Combat Extended Also shows hands when using Grab your Tool (some mods like yayoAnimation might override this, I might release a tweaked build for yayo) Replacements if you're coming from FS // Additions for Noobs :cP As not all functionality of FS is included, these are the things missing and their replacement. · Facial Animations: they are gone but there's a mod with the same name doing exactly that. · https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1635901197 [NL] Facial Animation - WIP by NAls used together with · https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2555107849 Faces of the Rim - Facial Animationby Capi to get the RW vanilla style faces · Additional skin colors:the 10 skin colors are gone. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2788534838 Misc Melanin by Lugaru adds 20. · 39 Beards and moustaches were stripped and released as vanilla beards here https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2793411141 History This mod is based on Mlie's Show Me Your Hands which is based on Clutter Weapon Hands by mrofa. The initial hand features of Facial Stuff were also based on Clutter, so using SMYH as a new and improved base with its better compatibility--and working with RW 1.3 from scratch--seemed to be the best option. Based on Clutter Weapon Hands but dynamically sets the hands based on the graphics of the weapon. It will however still use the old hand-definitions if they exist. There is also mod-settings where you can modify the settings for each weapon. These settings can be exported and included in a mod to add native support. All my "Continued"-mods should have native support. Settings · Coloring the hands based on apparel/armor color · Coloring the hands based on artificial limbs · Resizing the hands based on the bodysize of the pawn, this also works with Children · Repositioning the hands based on the weaponsize, to support oversized weapons · Showing the hands when pawns carry stuff · Showing only one hand if the pawn is missing one · Showing the hands at all times Credits Arcanant for providing hand-definitions for a lot of mods. Telefonmast for the support with the texture-code. qux for the updated hand-texture. shiuanyue for the Chinese translation. Preview-image includes armor and weapons from the excellent XCOM-mods by velcroboy333 - XCOM Armor · XCOM Weapons Since modding is just a hobby for me I expect no donations to keep modding. If you still want to show your support you can gift me anything from my store.steampowered.com/wishlist/id/Mlie Wishlistor buy me a cup of tea. Troubleshooting · See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. · If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. · Post your error-log using HugsLib and command Ctrl+F12 · For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. · Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. · If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository.
